同一词翻译一致/同一词翻译一致_0053.jpg.mt:
Haier Dual-Cycle Constant Temperature Technology sets new industry standards!

Constant Temperature Ceiling, Full-Process Comfort Shower

Solve the industry challenge of water temperature fluctuations when turning off and on water during bathing  
Achieve true constant temperature comfort throughout the bathing process

Constant Temperature 1.0  
Bypass Mixing Water  
Neutralize pipe hot water  
Only solves secondary overheating issues  
Unable to solve cold water problem when stopping water  
Inaccurate temperature control  

Constant Temperature 2.0  
No Cold Sensation Constant Temperature  
Two-stage adjustable start-stop valve  
Hot and cold mixing only solves scalding water  
Without preheating, cold water still exists  
Autumn and winter seasons start-stop temperature drop exceeds 10°C  
Cannot completely eliminate mixed water  

Constant Temperature 3.0  
Dual-Cycle Constant Temperature  
Start-stop constant temperature + heat storage constant temperature  
Cold and hot neutralization cycle eliminates scalding water  
Preheat circulation eliminates cold water  
Solves the烦恼of mixed water during bathing  
Guarantees constant temperature throughout the bathing process regardless of seasonal changes
src: 海尔双循环恒温科技 再创行业新高！
恒温天花板 全程舒适浴
解决沐浴中途关水再开水温忽烫忽冷的行业难题
实现真正的沐浴全程恒温舒适
但仅解决二次出水超温
无法解决启停冷水问题
恒温2.0 - 无冷感恒温 两档调节启停阀
冷热混合仅仅解决烫水
无前置预热 冷水依旧存在
恒温3.0 - 双循环恒温 启停恒温+储热恒温
冷热中和循环 消除烫水
前置储热循环 消除冷水
解决沐浴夹生水的烦恼
